===============================================================================

   stb_image 1.46
   https://github.com/nothings/stb

===============================================================================

stb_image - v1.46 - public domain JPEG/PNG reader - https://github.com/nothings/stb
   when you control the images you're loading no warranty implied;
   use at your own risk

   stb_image_write 0.97
   https://github.com/nothings/stb

===============================================================================

stb_image_write - v0.97 - public domain - http://nothings.org/stb/stb_image_write.h
   writes out PNG/BMP/TGA images to C stdio - Sean Barrett 2010
   no warranty implied; use at your own risk
